title: podcasting_documentation
text:
Preface
This is a set of documents designed to help students and faculty make use of the ODY Podcasting Studios.
To learn more about our Digital Scholarship Work: https://digital.stlawu.edu

dsf workshop


This is where we will put additional information, along with some graphics.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.

1 + 1

[1] 2






Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  Summary
text:
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
